Question
========

A person achieves a score of 10.4 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 11.1 with a standard deviation 0.6. The z-score of the person with 10.4 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -2.5
* -1.17
* -0.28

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-2.5: Incorrect
-1.17: Correct
-0.28: Incorrect
